content: The file will be permanently removed from the Trash.

comment.text: This text confirms the permanent deletion of a file from the Trash. It appears within a confirmation dialog, informing the user that the file will be permanently removed. Translators should ensure the wording accurately conveys the irreversible nature of the action.

usage.context: {{ name: selection[0].title }} to Trash. {" "} {isFolder ? t("FolderPermanentlyDeleted") : t("FilePermanentlyDeleted")}{" "} {t("Common:WantToContinue")} ); } const items = separateItems(selection);
